001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.widget.SeekBar;
005import android.widget.SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener;
006import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
007import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
008import androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBar;
009import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
010import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
011import android.view.LayoutInflater;
012import android.view.View;
013import android.view.ViewGroup;
014import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
015import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter.GameResultsAdapter;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.FragmentScoresBinding;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.GameResultViewModel;
020
021@AndroidEntryPoint
022public class ScoresFragment extends Fragment implements OnSeekBarChangeListener {
023
024  private FragmentScoresBinding binding;
025  private GameResultViewModel viewModel;
026  private int initialCodeLength;
027
028  @Override
029  public void onCreate(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
030    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
031    initialCodeLength = ScoresFragmentArgs.fromBundle(getArguments()).getCodeLength();
032  }
033
034  @Override
035  public View onCreateView(
036      @NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
037    // Inflate the layout for this fragment
038    binding = FragmentScoresBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
039    binding.codeLength.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(this);
040    binding.clearScores.setOnClickListener((v)->viewModel.clearResults());
041    return binding.getRoot();
042  }
043
044  @Override
045  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
046    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
047    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(GameResultViewModel.class);
048    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
049    viewModel
050        .getGameResults()
051        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (gameResults) -> {
052          GameResultsAdapter adapter = new GameResultsAdapter(requireContext(), gameResults);
053          binding.gameResults.setAdapter(adapter);
054        });
055    binding.codeLength.setProgress(binding.codeLength.getMin());
056    binding.codeLength.setProgress(binding.codeLength.getMax());
057    binding.codeLength.setProgress(initialCodeLength);
058  }
059
060  @Override
061  public void onDestroyView() {
062    binding = null;
063    super.onDestroyView();
064  }
065
066
067
068  @Override
069  public void onProgressChanged(SeekBar seekBar, int progress, boolean fromUser) {
070    viewModel.setCodeLength(progress);
071    binding.codeLengthValue.setText(String.valueOf(progress));
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  public void onStartTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) {
076    // Do nothing. No need to handle this
077  }
078
079  @Override
080  public void onStopTrackingTouch(SeekBar seekBar) {
081    // Do nothing. No need to handle this
082  }
083
084}
